extendedInfo.description: Omegle Plus FREE is an Omegle client for Android.* Tens of users agree that Omegle Plus is the best FREE Omegle client on Android!Talk to strangers, send them photos and more. Omegle Plus is a simple yet powerful client for your Android smartphone.âââ IN APP REMOVE BANNER ADS, just tap your menu button or the three dots in the upper right site âââ We've been listening to your requests, some nice feature in this release :) â Light and Dark Theme. â Notifications with sound and vibration. â Language Match. â Chat Share !!!!!. â Banner Remove. â Code OptimizationIt currently features:  â Standard Mode: Simple chat 1 to 1 â Ask Question mode: Let you ask a question and spy two strangers â Answer question mode: Let you discuss with a stranger a random question â Double Spy mode: see below.Double Spy mode:the double spy mode let you spy 1 to 1 conversation in omegle. That's not all... Infact you'll be able to take part (silently or not) to the conversation and eventually disconnect one of the 2 strangers.  It's really up to you!The double spy mode is not available in Omegle so this is a feature you won't be able to find in Omegle.-------------------Known problems: â Support for interests - They'll be added very soon â Captcha: Captchas are not our fault. It's from omegle.com itself. Try to use a wifi connection if they bore you--------------------Feature requests? Problems? We'd like to hear from you. Please send us an email for anything before low-rating the app. Enjoy :)

reviews.title: cool, but
reviews.comment: this is cool and good but sometimes the notif just come to bar,5 if it fixed
reviews.author: Muhamad Rusdiyana

reviews.title: Used to be good
reviews.comment: The app worked great for a while but lately, I can\'t change to any other modes than standard, even if I select another mode. Fix this and its 5 stars.
reviews.author: Sage Rage

reviews.title: Not the best
reviews.comment: This app used to work for me very well but lately, none of the strangers messages will come up in the chat. I have to check my notifications to read their message. Fix this and it will be 5 star.
reviews.author: Bri Heffley

reviews.title: All Good, But...
reviews.comment: Sometimes the messages from the other person won\'t show up in the chat. It\'ll just show up in my notification bar. :/
reviews.author: Emily Grace

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: I can\'t video chat or share interests.
reviews.author: Shakeeb Ahmed

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: U did a awsome job on this really some day u guys should make a teen  website and adults website for this because i love it and it free thanks u guys I\'m happy for what u did on it i give u thumbs up
reviews.author: Andrew Lengson

reviews.title: Eh.
reviews.comment: Always messing up. Sometimes strangers\' text will only show up notification bar, not chat. Sometimes the chat doesn\'t change when you select a new type.
reviews.author: ashley hauthaway

reviews.title: Ok sometimes
reviews.comment: Messages always show up in notification bar but not on screen fix this get 5 stars
reviews.author: Brendan Bacon

reviews.title: Maybe a video mode?
reviews.comment: I love this app however I would love it if it added some sort of face-to-face video chat like the full website his. If that gets added then it\'ll be 5/5 for me
reviews.author: Doug Kautenberger

reviews.title: Super confused
reviews.comment: I opened up the app for the first time and it would not connect me to anyone. Reopened the app and was told I was temp banned... Ok.
reviews.author: Spencer Beck

reviews.title: Wel....
reviews.comment: Worked fine for me then all of a sudden i was banned wen i seid asl?.... Now it says connecting and nothing happpens. Fix and ill give 5 stars and tell ever1 i no
reviews.author: Liam Connolly

reviews.title: Used to work best
reviews.comment: It used to be the best client for omegle but after the last update there are a lot of bug. My chat partner\'s messages never comes up and many times it gives false notifications
reviews.author: Aman Dharia

reviews.title: NEEDS CAM OPTION
reviews.comment: Not cams all the time but both parties have to hit cam button to see each other
reviews.author: Steven proveaux

reviews.title: very fun
reviews.comment: Its a time killer and a great way to meet ppl and get a good laugh or two. Also could you add a video chat option?
reviews.author: Prince Trammell

reviews.title: Good but....
reviews.comment: No video chat juct simple chat \"hi\" and \"bye\"
reviews.author: sunny babar

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Too many children looking for sex, its a child porn trap needs an age filter
reviews.author: william Shaffer

reviews.title: Ehh
reviews.comment: I enjoy it except sometimes when talking to a stranger, it\'ll say stranger is typing when they aren\'t. Don\'t know if its just me or the app. Overall great!!
reviews.author: Iman Brooks

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: The new dark theme, the spy mode, it\'s smooth and almost bug free... I\'ve been using Omegle Plus before but then I stopped for a while but now it\'s even better than ever... don\'t you go lazy now developers, keep up the good work :)
reviews.author: Tarek Elchayeb

reviews.title: Really good, but...
reviews.comment: When ever I try to go into a chat, it takes way too long to connect, but other than that, it\'s a great app
reviews.author: Sheri Strayhorn

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: If u could get rid of the robot chaters it should be a 5 star app
reviews.author: Cole Kremer
